dct_description_sm: California with indented northern coast. California shown on 3 of the 18 maps. Map titles with paragraph of descriptive text for each (from top left): L'Ameriqve, Le Canada, La G Vaiane, Les Isles Caribes, La Nle. Espagne, Le N. Mexiqve, Les Isles Antilles, La Floride, La Castille Dor, Le Perov, Le Bresil, Le Chili, Le Paragvai, La Virginie, La Nle. Holande, La Nle. Svede, Le Nouueau Danemarq, and La Magellaniqve.
Par P. Duval Geographe du Roy.
